script: We worked late every single night this week to finish the presentation on time. It was exhausting, but we managed to include all the new data they requested. Ultimately, the result was that the client was extremely happy with the proposal. So, all that hard work actually paid off.

options: To summarize the final, overarching consequence of a difficult effort.
To complain that the client is too demanding.
To aggressively demand a raise from the boss.
To excitedly plan a vacation after finishing a project.

explanation: The speaker uses 'Ultimately' to distill a long, stressful process down to its final, positive outcome.
